name: Aquamarine rivet earrings
description:
'm thrilled to have these gorgeous aquamarine stones back in stock ahead of schedule in a variety of sizes. Thanks for your patience!

Chunky, ice blue aquamarines are suspended on my hand made riveted and wrapped sterling silver earwires. The long, elegant wires have a strong feminine curve to them, and the rivets give a touch of industrial. These aquamarines have a stunning color and an unusual cut, and I wanted to display them in a distinctive, yet simple setting. 

Aquamarine is the birthstone for March...these earrings will make the perfect gift for those with March birthdays. 

My sterling rivet series comes in a longer and a petite size. This is the longer size. Earrings are 1 and 5/8 inches long and the stone is 3/8 inch across. The aquamarine rivet earrings are also available in the petite size. 

This is a recycled listing (good photos are hard to come by, it turns out). Expect the earrings you receive to vary ever so slightly from the pair pictured. 

NEW: This design is now available with purple amethyst, green peridot, raspberry ruby, yellow citrine, or green prehnite.

SHIPPING

Item is in stock and will ship within 1-2 business days (after your payment clears) via USPS first class mail.

name: Cradled black pearl earrings
description:
These stunners are the favorites of everyone who sees them! A large black pearl (with iridescent hints of grey, blue, purple and green) is suspended from on a hand hammered earwire in a sterling silver cup. All the sterling components are hand cut, hammered, formed, oxidized, and polished by me. These earrings are very elegant! Perfect for your little black dress, or for bringing your jeans and T-shirt up a notch. 

I've put these earrings in my "best gifts" list--they look great on just about everyone, and have a color scheme that complements almost everything. They are lightweight for their size and very comfortable to wear. 

You can also request a different color of pearl. Options are pink, white, brown/tan, moss green, or blue/black (shown). 

Earring are about 2 inches long and the pearl measures 3/8 inch across. 


SHIPPING

Item is in stock and will ship within 1-2 business days of (after your payment clears) via USPS Priority mail.

name: Wood and sterling hoop earrings
description:
A little sterling silver hoop...with a difference. A wooden bar is suspended horizontally from these hand hammered sterling silver hoops. A modern looking and deceptively simple design, for those who like to mix things up a little. These earrings are featherweight and comfortable to wear. 

Earwires are oxidized and polished for depth. 

Hoops are 7/8 inch across, and the wooden bead is 5/8 inch wide.
